query.description: Payment simulation scenario: SUCCESS, FAIL, ERROR

request.description: Simulates a successful payment. Automatically updates payment status to COMPLETED and order status to CONFIRMED.

query.description: Payment simulation scenario: SUCCESS, FAIL, ERROR

request.description: Simulates a failed payment (bank rejection). Updates payment status to FAILED and order status to CANCELLED.

query.description: Payment simulation scenario: SUCCESS, FAIL, ERROR

request.description: Simulates a payment gateway connection error. Updates payment status to FAILED and order status to CANCELLED.
